name: Shoot B
description:
A simple platform shooter game. Basically, it is a short game where you will only have to shoot the different enemies.

Hello, I am Jhisma (clearly that is not my real name) and basically, this is my first video game, so it is very likely that some things are not so well done, and you are going to notice them, so if you go to leave some criticism or review in the comments section, believe me, it will be very well received since it is right now when I need people's opinion about this video game and the following ones that I get. But hey, I think that would be it, I hope you are having a good day.

Goodbye :D
